name: CryptoAgent
0:
”Alexa, ask Crypto Agent for prices”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Agent to add ripple”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Agent to quote ripple”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto agent
des:
This skill gives quotes on a user supplied list of cryptocurrencies. Quotes are also displayed on Amazon Spot, Show, Fire Tablets & TV. Quotes can be in USD, EUR, GPB, CAD or AUD. 19 currencies supported in this release. For a cheatsheet and more details see http://cryptoagent.us. 

Supported phases:
* Alexa, ask Crypto Agent for prices
* Alexa, ask Crypto Agent to add Ethereum
* Alexa, ask Crypto Agent to quote Ethereum
* Alexa, ask Crypto Agent to set currency to Euros

For feedback and coin support request, email to greg@cryptoagent.us
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
